alert.note: Alert for Kerr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 2:01AM CDT until September 25 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN KERR COUNTY... At 201 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Kerr Wildlife Management Area, or 25 miles southeast of Junction, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kerr Wildlife Management Area and Mountain Home. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
